price: 59. Mas (Al-lah dirá a quien ponga dichas excusas:) “Ciertamente, te llegaron Mis pruebas (claras sobre la verdad) y las negaste llenándote de orgullo y fuiste de quienes rechazan la verdad”.
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَدۡ جَآءَتۡكَ ءَايَٰتِي فَكَذَّبۡتَ بِهَا وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرۡتَ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: balā qad jāatka āyātī fakadhabta bihā wa-is'takbarta wakunta mina al-kāfirīna
